articles.description: Philadelphia 76ers coach Doc Rivers said Wednesday that he wishes the media would "tell the whole story" when mentioning him as the only coach to blow more than one 3-1 series lead.
articles.content: CAMDEN, N.J. -- The Philadelphia 76ers practiced here Wednesday morning ahead of a return to Toronto for Game 6 of their Eastern Conference first-round playoff series against the Raptors on Thursday … [+5572 chars]
